title: Add WCAG 2.1 AA accessibility basics â€” ARIA labels, focus-visible, skip-nav
description: Add WCAG 2.1 AA accessibility basics to The Lab dashboard. Add ARIA labels to all interactive elements (buttons, links, form inputs, tabs). Implement focus-visible styles for keyboard navigation. Add skip-nav link for screen readers. Ensure color contrast ratios meet AA standards (4.5:1 for normal text, 3:1 for large text).
